titleStmt.title: His Majesties declaration to all his loving subjects concerning the treasonable conspiracy against his sacred person and government, lately discovered. Appointed to be read in all churches and chappels within this kingdom. / By His Majesties special command.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

titleStmt.title: His Majesties declaration to all his loving subjects concerning the treasonable conspiracy against his sacred person and government, lately discovered. Appointed to be read in all churches and chappels within this kingdom. / By His Majesties special command.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Took and John Crook ... and are to be sold by Mary Crook and Andrew Crook ... and by Joseph Wild ...,

notesStmt.note: Title page has royal arms, with initials "C R", the initial "C" containing the numeral "2".

With: By the Lord Deputy and Council. Arran. It having pleased almighty God by his wonderful providence ... Dublin, Benjamin Took and John Crook ... to be sold by Mary Crook and Andrew Crook, 1683. brs. Item also filmed and cataloged separately at reel 1594:34 (Wing 2nd ed. I420).
Reproduction of original in: Eton College. Library.
